LanguageData.VME_TaintedApparel_DontCare.label: don't care
LanguageData.VME_TaintedApparel_DontCare.description: Clothing soaked in blood or bits shouldn’t dissuade one from covering themselves and making use of what would otherwise be worn away by time.
LanguageData.VME_TaintedApparel_Disapproved.label: disapproved
LanguageData.VME_TaintedApparel_Disapproved.descripti: Wearing a dead person's apparel is quite disgusting.
LanguageData.VME_TaintedApparel_Abhorrent.label: abhorrent
LanguageData.VME_TaintedApparel_Abhorrent.description: There can be nothing more disgusting in this world than wearing the clothing used by a dead person.
